      • listToString

        public static java.lang.String listToString(java.util.List<?> list,
                                            java.lang.String removePart)
        Help Method to create a displayable string a list of object and replace a substring if necessary.

      • listToString

        public static java.lang.String listToString(java.util.List<?> list,
                                            java.lang.String removePart,
                                            boolean insertNewline,
                                            int indentLevel)
        Help Method to create a displayable string a list of object and replace a substring if necessary.
        Parameters:
        list - the list to build a displayable string of.
        removePart - substring to remove, use null when retaining all.
        insertNewline - if a new line should be added after each entry
        indentLevel - the number of spaces to a insert before the entry. (only used if insertNewline is true)
        Returns:
        a displayable string

      • listToString

        public static java.lang.String listToString(java.util.List<?> list,
                                            java.lang.String removePart,
                                            boolean insertNewline,
                                            int indentLevel,
                                            EncodeHelper.ToStringCallback toStringCallback)
        Help Method to create a displayable string a list of object and replace a substring if necessary.
        Parameters:
        list - the list to build a displayable string of.
        removePart - substring to remove, use null when retaining all.
        insertNewline - if a new line should be added after each entry
        indentLevel - the number of spaces to a insert before the entry. (only used if insertNewline is true)
        toStringCallback - callback to handle each object in list toString method separately. null for standard toString behaviour.
        Returns:
        a displayable string
